title: Daily Guide Launches Mobile News App
text:
16:31 CET Daily Guide Launches Mobile News App By Daily Guide 
DAILY GUIDE, Ghana's leading private newspaper, has launched its first official News app for mobile devices. 
The mobile app is designed to provide breaking news and analysis from Ghana, Africa and the world at large. 
Western Publications Ltd, the publishers, stated that the app was designed to bolster its market share and provide easy access to the latest news in politics, business, lifestyle, entertainment, sports, technology and real estate updated in real-time from its renowned newsroom. 
It further stated that with the proliferation of mobile devices and smartphones nationwide, DAILY GUIDE has made major inroads to reach many young and technology savvy readers. 
Business Director of Western Publications, Kwame Blay stated that 'it is undeniable that the entire world is moving towards online and mobile access to information at a fast rate, and Ghana is no different. This however does not mean a reduction in our traditional hard copy readers. Ghanaians still like to read a physical newspaper and turn the pages. 
We are only increasing our customer base by adding extra accessibility for those who prefer mobile news, or may not find it convenient to purchase the physical newspaper on a daily basis. We have also worked very hard on our Facebook, Twitter and Instagram access so our breaking stories and news can be seen conveniently across multiple platforms. 
Mr Blay added, 'Another key aspect for our publications is advertising and giving our clients an ever-growing return on every Cedi they spend advertising with us. With this mobile app and our social media presence, advertising campaigns placed via our brands get to reach multiple layers of readers and consumers.' 
The current version of the mobile app is available to Android users with an IOS version for Iphone users soon to be released. 
The app gives users the option to subscribe to an SMS based service to receive breaking news alerts in real time when they happen and ensure subscribers never miss the latest stories. 
There are other user options like voice your own opinion and connect with the editorial team by commenting on stories and sharing your favourite articles with friends through integrated social platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and WhatsApp. 
The Daily Guide mobile app is currently available for free download from the daily guide website, www.dailyguideghana.com and the Android store. 
A business desk report
